Name: (V79) Orbate/PTC
checklistText:
(V79) Orbate/PTC (BBQ Mode - R64)

		CMC - on (req)
		ISS - on & orient known (req)
			(For orbate, Ysm aligned to V x R)
		SCS - on (desired)
		RCS DAP - Load & activate (req)

Panel 7:
	LOGIC 2/3 PWR - on (up)

	1 Perform (V49E) R62
		Load gmbl angles for init of mnvr
			(orbate or PTC)

	
	2 Disable two adjacent RCS quads

	For PTC, att hold for 20 min

Panel 1:
	MAN ATT P&Y (2) - ACCEL CMD
	Enable all jets


Panel 2, 140:
	3 Key V79E

			Poss OPR ERR

		If in P00, go to 5
	

	4 FL V06 N16
		Time of event			00XXX. HRS
						000XX. MIN
						0XX.XX SEC

		Accept 	PRO
		Reject V25E
			Load desired data

	5 FL V06 N79
		Rate				X.XXXX DEG/SEC
		DBD				XXX.XX DEG

		Axix option (X or Y)		0000X.
			(0 = X axis, non-zero = Y axis)

Panel 1:
	Accept	SC CONT - CMC
		CMC MODE - AUTO

Panel 2, 140:
		PRO
	Reject	Key V25E
		Load desired data

Panel 1:
	For PTC, MAN ATT ROLL - ACCEL CMD
		MAN ATT P&Y (2) - RATE CMD

Panel 8:
	6 If desired for PTC, AUTO RCS (16) - OFF

Panel 1:
	RHC PWR DIR (both) - OFF

	7 To term mnvr

Panel 2, 140:
	Orbate
		Key V46E

	PTC

Panel 1:
		MAN ATT (3) - ACCEL CMD

Panel 8:
		AUTO RCS (16) - MNA or MNB
		V46E or cycle SC CONT sw

Panel 1:
		MAN ATT (3) - RATE CMD
